issue.title: [CF 676] Large amount LUA error
issue.body:
Large amount LUA error occurs.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Engage any battle, especially bosses.
2.
3.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
Too many LUA error prompts.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
6.0.3

Do you have an error log of what happened?

Message: ...en\Components\IconModules\IconModule_Alpha\Alpha.lua:96: attempt to compare nil with number
Time: 10/29/12 20:11:17
Count: 6692
Stack: ...en\Components\IconModules\IconModule_Alpha\Alpha.lua:96: in function `OnUpdate'
...n\Components\EventHandlers\Animations\Animations.lua:105: in function <...n\Components\EventHandlers\Animations\Animations.lua:98>
(tail call): ?
[C]: ?
[string "safecall Dispatcher[4]"]:9: in function <[string "safecall Dispatcher[4]"]:5>
(tail call): ?

Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1891: in function <Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1851>

Locals: <none>
